project_abstract.cdata: The Sustainable Coastal Resource Development Project aims to 1) support the government in sustainably developing China's coastal resources; 2) reduce pressure on coastal fishery resources and 3) help improve aquatic product quality. There are four components. The first forms and implements programs in four provinces. It establishes institutional arrangements to promote coastal zone management (CZM); assesses resource use; provides hardware and software for data management and analysis as well as equipment and training for environmental data collection and analysis; establishes fishery and environmental management centers; provides surveillance vessels and equipment; and establishes a coastal forest protection belt. The second component supports environmentally sustainable marine aquaculture in shallow waters and tidal flats. It finances equipment, facilities, and services to farmers in aquaculture. It raises fin fish in net cages; breeds oysters, scallops, kelp, algae, clams, and laver (a red algae); and uses artificial breeding techniques. The third component supports trials of new methods of shrimp culture. The fourth finances a number of seafood handling operations, including processing and wholesale markets, to improve product quality and safety. Selected cold storage, packaging facilities, and wholesale markets will be expanded and improved, and processing facilities will be built and expanded. Training will occur in hazard analysis.

P003539.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>沿海地区资源可持续发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在：（1）支持政府部门以可持续方式开发中国沿海地区资源；（2）减轻对沿海渔业资源压力；（3）帮助提高水产品质量。本项目设有四个子项目。第一个子项目将形成方案并在四省实施方案，制定促进海岸区管理的机构安排，评估资源利用情况，为数据管理和分析工作提供软件和硬件，为环境数据收集和分析工作提供设备和培训，营造沿海防护林带。第二个子项目将支持以环境可持续方式在浅水域和潮间带发展海水养殖业，资助向养殖户提供设备、设施和服务，进行有鳍鱼网箱养殖，进行牡蛎、扇贝、海带、海藻、文蛤及紫菜养殖，应用人工养殖技术。第三个子项目将支持试用新型养虾方法。第四个子项目将资助发展多种海产品业务，包括发展产品加工和批发市场，目的是提高产品质量和安全水平。项目将对选定的冷藏和包装设施及批发市场进行扩建改造，同时也将新建或扩建加工设施。此外，将就如何进行危害分析提供培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
